physical_examinations.vital_signs: Occipitofrontal circumference: 61 cm (>97th percentile for height)
physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Diffuse excoriated cutaneous lesions, multiple superficial scars on the face, large noduloulcerative lesion in the right medial canthus with extension into the orbit, proptosis, reduced motility of the right eye.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Initially had orbital infiltration with right orbital and maxillary sinus involvement. Post-treatment imaging in September 1999 showed reduction in the size of the orbital mass.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Circumscribed lesion on the bridge of the nose, large noduloulcerative lesion extending into the medial orbit on the left side.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Patient was free of local recurrence until death in 1990 from unrelated causes.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Frontal bossing and palmar pits. Ulcerated nodular lesion on the medial aspect of the right upper eyelid.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: The lesion was excised in May 1995 and was tumor-free by June 2000.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Severe crusting of the left orbital socket after exenteration with no recurrent tumor; palmar pits presented.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Underwent multiple surgeries for basal cell carcinoma but was free of local disease and metastasis as of June 2000.
